question: Misaanka caadiga ah ee ilmaha 5-bilood jirka ah waa imisa?
Ilmaha 5-bilood jirka ah ma fariisan karaa?
options: Haa, keligiis ayuu si fiican u fariisan karaa
Haa, isagoo la taageerayo oo dhabarka la xajinayo
correctAnswer: Haa, isagoo la taageerayo oo dhabarka la xajinayo

question: Maxaa lagu gartaa aragga ilmaha 5-bilood jirka ah?
options: Wuxuu jecel yahay midabada madow iyo caddaan kaliya
Wuxuu arkaa kaliya walxaha aadka u dhow

question: Goorma ayaa lagu talinayaa in ilmaha la baro cuntada adag?
Imisa saacadood ayuu badanaa seexdaa ilmaha 5-bilood jirka ah maalintii?
Erayada uu ku hadaaqo ilmaha 5-bilood jirka ah waxaa ka mid ah?
options: Weli wax cod ah ma sameeyo

question: Haddii ilmuhu habeenkii tooso, maxaa habboon in la sameeyo?
options: In lala ciyaaro oo la qosliyo
In nalka loo daaro oo lala sheekaysto
In aan lala sheekaysan, nalkana la daarin, laguna celiyo hurdada
correctAnswer: In aan lala sheekaysan, nalkana la daarin, laguna celiyo hurdada
